name: The Red Ribbon Killer - LD40
description:
Short adventure game made for Ludum Dare 40, theme

"The more you have, the worse it is".

Has the red ribbon killer struck again? The police department is fed up with all the murders, the more they get, the worse the media attention gets. You control two detectives attempting to solve the most recent case. Can you find the right clues and solve the case?

Left click to inspect objects and advance dialogue.

Music:

"Walking Along" & "I Knew a Guy"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
